 test21
--------
Layer             : II 
Protection        : no
Bitrate base      : VBR
Sampling rate     : 44.1 kHz
Private bit       : 0
Mode              : stereo
Copyright         : no
Original          : yes
Emphasis          : none (flat)

Configuration     : 3/2.0
Extension         : yes
Bitrate extension : VBR
Matrix procedure  : 0
Dynamic crosstalk : no
Phantom centre    : no
Prediction        : no
Multilingual      : no
Multilingual fs   : n.a.

Ancillary data    : none

Remark:	          : Variable bit rate, total average about 384 kbit/s,
                    low bit rates are included in the base stream.
		    
Nr. of frames     : 30
Test signal       : left channel: female english speech;
                    right channel: male english speech;
                    center channel: female french speech;
                    surroud channels: stereo castanets signal;
Files             : test21.mpg
                    test21.ext
                    test21_l.pcm   (16 bit/sample)
                    test21_r.pcm   (16 bit/sample)
                    test21_c.pcm   (16 bit/sample)
                    test21_ls.pcm  (16 bit/sample)
                    test21_rs.pcm  (16 bit/sample)
                    test21.info
